file.name: approval.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: |
    Approval approve/reject
  version: "0.0.1"
  title: Approval
  contact:
    email: sunghyun_kim3@tmax.co.kr
tags:
  - name: Decision
paths:
  /apis/cicdapi.tmax.io/v1/namespaces/{namespace}/approvals/{name}/approve:
    put:
      tags:
        - Decision
      summary: Approve the approval
      description: Approve the approval
      parameters:
        - in: "path"
          name: namespace
          description: namespace of the Approval
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
        - in: "path"
          name: name
          description: name of the Approval
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Request'
            example:
              reason: "Reason for the approval"
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Approved
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example: {}
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
  /apis/cicdapi.tmax.io/v1/namespaces/{namespace}/approvals/{name}/reject:
    put:
      tags:
        - Decision
      summary: Reject the approval
      description: Reject the approval
      parameters:
        - in: "path"
          name: namespace
          description: namespace of the Approval
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
        - in: "path"
          name: name
          description: name of the Approval
          required: true
          schema:
            type: "string"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Request'
            example:
              reason: "Reason for the approval"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Rejected
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example: {}
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
        '403':
          description: Forbidden
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
        '500':
          description: Internal Server Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                example:
                  message: "error message"
components:
  schemas:
    Request:
      type: object
      description: Reason
      properties:
        reason:
          type: string
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
security:
  - bearerAuth: []
